title: Strange situation
body: Just queued up for ranked solo/duo queue by myself, got into champion select. Then all of a sudden I got backed out back to pick a game mode and then transported back into that same champion select as before, other people from the lobby had it happen to them as well. Then we could not ban in the banning phase, and I got kicked for dodging. Now I got a 30 minute timer....

replies.body: Uhhhhh that's pretty heckin' strange. It might have just been a weird client bug from damaged game files, so let's be sure to run a quick repair through the client options. Let me know if happens again!
